tasks.label: Ruff the current file
tasks.command: uv run isort "${file}" && uv run black "${file}" && uv run ruff check --fix "${file}" && uv run ruff format "${file}"

tasks.label: Ruff the project
tasks.command: uv run isort . && uv run black . && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .

tasks.label: Coverage Report
tasks.command: uv run coverage run --omit=tests/* -m pytest && uv run coverage run --omit=tests/* -a -m pytest -m docker && uv run coverage html && uv run coverage erase
